mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName}( member1, member2, member3, cost, diff, grow ) values( ${member1}, ${member2}, ${member3}, ${cost}, ${diff}, ${grow})

insert into ${tableName}( member1, member2, member3, member4, cost, diff, grow ) values( ${member1}, ${member2}, ${member3}, ${member4}, ${cost}, ${diff}, ${grow})
